New.Headline: Customizable icon styling
New.Body: Customise the positioning, scale and more inside the AssetIconAttribute parameters.

New.Headline: Support for multiple graphics
New.Body: Added support for multiple graphics being rendered for a single asset.

New.Headline: Preferences menu
New.Body: Added a tab to Unity's Preferences Window for customising AssetIcons.

New.Headline: Updated Documentation Format
New.Body: Removed the PDF documentation in favour of interactive HTML documentation.

Removed.Headline: Modules System
Removed.Body: Removed the old "Modules" system in favour of the preferences menu.

Fixes.Headline: ReflectionTypeLoadException after code recompilation
Fixes.Body: This exception was being thrown after code recompilation only on certain environments.
